refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Describe how to use application with &A;

refsect1.title: APPLICATIONS
refsect1.para: This section lists the applications included with &A;. See the individual man pages for instructions on using them. For complete How-To information, consult the Amanda wiki at http://wiki.zmanda.com.

itemizedlist.listitem: amgtar8, - use GNU Tar to backup and restore data.
amsamba8, - use smbclient to backup and restore data.
amstar8, - use star to backup and restore data.
amzfs-sendrecv8, - use zfs to create a snapshot and use 'zfs send' to generate the backup.
